member.name: T:FortressCraft.Community.CommunityItemInterface
member.summary: A community interface to allow cross-mod communication for item storage

member.name: M:FortressCraft.Community.CommunityItemInterface.HasItems
member.summary: Checks to see if a Storage Medium has any items
member.returns: True if the storage medium has any item, false otherwise

member.name: M:FortressCraft.Community.CommunityItemInterface.HasItem(ItemBase)
member.summary:
Checks to see if a Storage Medium has the specified item
Checks for Ore/Item/Cube
member.returns: True if the storage medium has the specified item, false otherwise

member.name: M:FortressCraft.Community.CommunityItemInterface.HasItems(ItemBase,System.Int32@)
member.summary:
Checks to see if a Storage Medium has the specified item
Checks for Ore/Item/Cube
member.param: Stores the amount of the items available
member.returns: True if the storage medium has the specified item, false otherwise

member.name: M:FortressCraft.Community.CommunityItemInterface.HasFreeSpace(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Checks to see if a Storage Medium has amount capcity free
member.param: The amount of capcity to check for
member.returns: True if the storage medium has amount capacity free, otherwise false

member.name: M:FortressCraft.Community.CommunityItemInterface.GetFreeSpace
member.summary: Get the free capcity of the entity
member.returns: The free capcity of the entity

member.name: M:FortressCraft.Community.CommunityItemInterface.GiveItem(ItemBase)
member.summary: Attempts to give the Item to a Storage Medium
member.param: The Item to give to a Storage Medium
member.returns: True if the Storage Medium accepted the item, otherwise false

member.name: M:FortressCraft.Community.CommunityItemInterface.TakeItem(ItemBase)
member.summary: Attempts to take an Item from a Storage Medium
member.returns: An ItemBase if the requested Item was found, otherwise null

member.name: M:FortressCraft.Community.CommunityItemInterface.TakeAnyItem
member.summary: Attempts to take any item from a Storage Medium
member.returns: An ItemBase if there's something to return, or null if empty

member.name: M:FortressCraft.Community.CommunityUtil.CheckSurrounding``1(MachineEntity,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Checks the N/E/S/W/Up/Down directions of the Center block for any SegmentEntitys of T; Will report whether there was a failure because a segment wasn't loaded.
member.typeparam: The SegmentEntity class to search for.
member.param: Whether or not a Null Segment was Encountered

member.summary: Compares the ItemID, Type, CubeType, and CubeValue values of ItemCubeStack Does not compare the Amounts
member.returns: True if ItemID, Type, CubeType, CubeValue of both Items match, otherwise false

member.summary: Compares the ItemID, Type, CurrentDurability, and MaxDurability values of ItemDurability
member.returns: True if ItemID, Type, CurrentDurability, and MaxDurability of both Items match, otherwise false

member.summary: Compares ItemID and Type values of ItemSingle
